title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view or looked for it in the Edit menu. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference, which is confusing for users. It is not clear why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. All actions should be reachable from the editor without having to switch to a different view.
OB: When selecting text, the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu.
EB: I expected to see the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action in the context menu when I selected text.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the editor and select some text.
2. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu.
3. Observe that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present in the context menu.
